text: Gertrud Franziska Gabriele Eysoldt (30 November 1870 – 6 January 1955) was a German actress. She appeared in more than fifteen films from 1923 to 1949. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
